title: Trump warns Iran against attacking US
shortDescription: As the conflict with Israel and Iran escalates, President Trump warned Iran not to strike any U.S. targets.

title: Majority of Americans disapprove of Trump administration: new poll
shortDescription: A majority of Americans say they disapprove of Donald Trump’s second term – with even some Republicans hitting the president.

title: 'No Kings' rallies across US to protest Trump
shortDescription: Hundreds of thousands of demonstrators filled the streets across the country in coordinated "No Kings" marches to protest President Trump.

title: GOP senator criticizes Trump's military parade: 'Never liked the idea'
shortDescription: Sen. Rand Paul criticized the June 14 military parade, arguing that it was too expensive and “glorified” weapons.

title: Can Trump pull off peace plans, trade deals at the G7? What to know
shortDescription: Trump has often been a disruptor at global gatherings, badgering U.S. allies and competitors alike. But the dynamic could be different in 2025.

title: 'Full strength and might': Trump warns Iran against attacking US
shortDescription: President Donald Trump said the United will come down on Iran “at levels never seen before” if the Middle Eastern country attacks.

title: Army parade may signal start of new chapter in Trump tenure
shortDescription: "No Kings" marches in all 50 states were reminiscent of some of America's biggest debates, from Vietnam to civil rights.

title: Dads in the Trump family: Who is celebrating Father's Day?
shortDescription: Sunday is Father's Day, and also the day after President Donald Trump's 79th birthday. With 5 kids and 11 grandkids, he has plenty to celebrate.

title: Trump: USA 'hottest country in the world'
shortDescription: President Donald Trump saluted the U.S. Army on it's 250th birthday with a military parade and live music.

title: President Trump arrives at military parade
shortDescription: President Donald Trump arrived at his viewing stand to watch the Army parade. The event also marks the president's 79th birthday.

title: Trump says Putin called to wish him a happy birthday and talk Iran
shortDescription: Trump, who turned 79, said: "President Putin called this morning to very nicely wish me a Happy Birthday, but to more importantly, talk about Iran."

title: Trump says shootings of Minnesota lawmakers 'will not be tolerated'
shortDescription: President Trump said the shootings of two Minnesota state lawmakers "will not be tolerated" and that the FBI is investigating the attack.

title: Trump says 'war in Israel-Iran should end'
shortDescription: Trump and Putin spoke for about an hour on June 14, with the Kremlin saying the Russian leader condemned the Israeli military operation against Iran

title: 'We knew everything,' Trump tells Reuters about Israel's strikes on Iran
shortDescription: Trump had repeatedly pushed Israeli Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu to delay an Israeli attack to give diplomacy more time.

title: Trump celebrates Army amid protests, Minnesota manhunt: recap
shortDescription: Tanks and thousands of troops paraded through the streets of Washington, D.C., for the Army's 250th anniversary on President Donald Trump's birthday.

title: Everything you need to know about Trump's DC military parade
shortDescription: Here's everything you need to know about the parade to honor the 250th anniversary of the US Army, including the schedule, route and how to watch.

title: Tanks, helicopters and a parade: How Trump is spending his birthday
shortDescription: The Army expects as many as 200,000 people to attend the parade that honors the U.S. Army’s formation and coincides with Donald Trump’s birthday.

title: See where Donald Trump ranks among the oldest presidents
shortDescription: Donald Trump marks his 79th birthday Saturday, June 14. Here's where he ranks among the oldest presidents to ever hold office.
